#summary Declaration of destructors.
<wiki:toc max_depth="3"/>

= Destructor declaration =
The syntax to declare a destructor is specified by:
<blockquote><em>
destructor-declaration:
    annotations<sub>opt</sub> ~ identifier ( ) destructor-body
destructor-body:
    block<br/>
    ;
</em></blockquote>
Declaring a destructor in a Stab class:
{{{
using java.lang;
class C {
    ~C() {
        System.out.println("C finalization");
    }
}
}}}
is equivalent to the Java code:
{{{
class C {
    protected void finalize() {
        try {
            System.out.println("C finalization");
        } finally {
            super.finalize();
        }
    }
}
}}}
